translation.description: Subscribe now to receive updates whenever a new DOSM publication is released!
translation.step1_desc: Enter the email that you have subscribed with
translation.step2_desc: Enter the token sent to your email to verify it's you
translation.email_required: Please fill in your email address.
translation.email_invalid: Please fill in a valid email address.
translation.email_absent: You don't have a subscription with this email.
translation.choose_publication_desc: You will only receive emails for the publications you select
